org.judal.storage

Class StorageContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.storage.StorageContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StorageContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable

    Container for a set of data sources used together by a client application.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

        public void initializeKeyValueDataSource(Engine<? extends BucketDataSource> bucketEngine,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException

        Create an initialize a non-transactional key-value data source from a map of configuration properties.

        Properties must be as listed in org.judal.storage.DataSource static variables.
        Parameters:
        bucketEngine - Engine<? extends BucketDataSource>
        properties - Map<String,String;>
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the key-value data source for this StorageContext has already been initialized.
